meta.description: Nirmanakaya Glossary — hotlink popup definitions for all terms including framework concepts

potential.name: Potential
potential.short: Pure possibility before differentiation. The ground of all becoming. Step 0 — existence itself.

will.name: Will
will.short: Conscious direction — the capacity to choose. Creates the two horizons. You are always choosing.

wisdom.name: Wisdom
wisdom.short: Direct knowing before thought. Perception that doesn't need proof. Opens the eye that makes witnessing possible.

nurturing.name: Nurturing
nurturing.short: Sustained care that grows what was perceived. Creates Self/Other structure. What you tend becomes real.

order.name: Order
order.short: The capacity to build frameworks. Creates the four process stages. Structure enables, not constrains.

culture.name: Culture
culture.short: Shared meaning passed between minds. Creates the observer function. What you teach persists.

compassion.name: Compassion
compassion.short: Loving connection between differentiated beings. Creates the ten nodes. Love retrieves what's been pushed to Ring 7.

drive.name: Drive
drive.short: Directional momentum that sustains connection. Creates the twenty archetypal positions. Where are you charging?

fortitude.name: Fortitude
fortitude.short: The capacity to contain what needs containing. Creates the forty basis states. Strength is capacity, not force.

discipline.name: Discipline
discipline.short: Sustained practice that purifies capacity. Creates purpose vectors. Purpose becomes clear through solitary inquiry.

source.name: Source
source.short: The Turn — where creation becomes operation. Ingress portal. You are both the spinner and the spun.

source.name: Source
source.short: The eternal pattern. The Turn where creation pivots to operation. Ingress portal.

equity.name: Equity
equity.short: Fair reckoning — you receive what you create. First operation after the Turn. Fairness is recognized, not imposed.

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.short: Conscious letting go of what no longer serves. Makes space for new creation. Surrender is trust, not loss.

change.name: Change
change.short: Necessary endings that enable new beginnings. What refuses to die refuses to be reborn.

balance.name: Balance
balance.short: Dynamic harmony between opposites. Not stillness but flowing equilibrium. Opposites create together.

abstraction.name: Abstraction
abstraction.short: Pattern recognition that shows what binds. The Devil is honest — he shows you your chains. Liberation begins with seeing.

breakthrough.name: Breakthrough
breakthrough.short: Liberation through necessary destruction. False structures must fall. The Tower falls so you can see the sky.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.short: Light pouring forth after collapse. What you shine heals the dark. After the Tower falls, the Star appears.

imagination.name: Imagination
imagination.short: Vision weaving experience into symbolic meaning. The Moon illuminates through reflection. What you dream, you create.

actualization.name: Actualization
actualization.short: Becoming what you willed. Radiant expression of choice fulfilled. The Sun shines without asking permission.

awareness.name: Awareness
awareness.short: Clear seeing of what you've become. Judgement isn't punishment — it's recognition. This seeing IS the integration.

creation.name: Creation
creation.short: Completion that returns to Source transformed. Egress portal. The World touches the Fool. Everything cycles.

creation.name: Creation
creation.short: The completion that isn't ending but continuance through return. Egress portal.

gestalt-house.name: Gestalt House
gestalt-house.short: The Soul domain — observer and journey itself. Command: 'Fulfill Your Destiny.' Self-governing. Ring 2.

spirit-house.name: Spirit House
spirit-house.short: The domain of aspiration and witness. Command: 'Witness Creation.' Governed by Potential (0). Ring 6.

mind-house.name: Mind House
mind-house.short: The domain of cognition and pattern. Command: 'Channel the Force.' Governed by Actualization (19). Ring 5.

emotion-house.name: Emotion House
emotion-house.short: The domain of feeling and choice. Command: 'Free Will.' Governed by Awareness (20). Ring 4.

body-house.name: Body House
body-house.short: The domain of form and embodiment. Command: 'Uphold the Law.' Governed by Will (1). Ring 3.

ring-0.name: Ring 0
ring-0.short: Source/Origin — the original creative act. Where it all begins.

ring-1.name: Ring 1
ring-1.short: Ingress — portal boundary where potential enters the system.

ring-2.name: Ring 2
ring-2.short: Identity — Gestalt House. Soul coherence, the observer itself.

ring-3.name: Ring 3
ring-3.short: Foundation — Body House. Embodied structure, form made real.

ring-4.name: Ring 4
ring-4.short: Resonance — Emotion House. Felt connection, relational attunement.

ring-5.name: Ring 5
ring-5.short: Agency — Mind House. WHERE CREATION HAPPENS. Conscious choice in the Now. What you make here compounds.

ring-6.name: Ring 6
ring-6.short: Direction — Spirit House. Where creation points before manifestation. Setting course.

ring-7.name: Ring 7
ring-7.short: Egress/Un-Now — residue beyond recursive reach. Not punishment, just not-present. Retrievable through conscious return.

now.name: Now
now.short: Ring 5 — where conscious creation happens. Present-aligned. What you create here becomes eternal, compounding with the Whole.

un-now.name: Un-Now
un-now.short: Ring 7 — where creation lands when not aligned with presence. Not hell, not punishment — just not-present. The return is always instant.

the-un-now.name: The Un-Now
the-un-now.short: Ring 7. Where imbalanced creation accumulates. Accessible because you have full liberty — even to disconnect. But in disconnection, purpose becomes irrelevant.

balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.short: Present-aligned. Creating at Ring 5 (Now). This function is operating correctly — what you make here compounds with the Whole.

too-much.name: Too Much
too-much.short: Future-projected. Creating at Ring 7 (Un-Now). Anxiety-forms — over-controlling, grasping, forcing. The diagonal partner shows the path home.

too-little.name: Too Little
too-little.short: Past-anchored. Creating at Ring 7 (Un-Now). Regret-forms — inhibited, withdrawn, refusing. The vertical partner shows the path home.

unacknowledged.name: Unacknowledged
unacknowledged.short: Dissociated. Creating at Ring 7 (Un-Now). Shadow-forms — operating without consent, unseen. The reduction partner shows the path home.

seed.name: Seed
seed.short: Initiates — opens the capacity. The first stage of the four-stage process cycle. Pure yang, initiating energy.

medium.name: Medium
medium.short: Develops — sustains and structures. The second stage. Yin-in-yang, processing what was initiated.

fruition.name: Fruition
fruition.short: Completes — brings to expression. The third stage. Pure yin, the function fully expressed.

feedback.name: Feedback
feedback.short: Integrates — weaves back into the cycle. The fourth stage. Yang-in-yin, returning signal to restart the cycle.

intent.name: Intent
intent.short: The channel of directed will. Initiation, propulsion, force made active. How you DIRECT creative energy.

cognition.name: Cognition
cognition.short: The channel of discernment. Differentiation, boundaries, clarity. How you DIFFERENTIATE in creation.

resonance.name: Resonance
resonance.short: The channel of connection. Feeling, value, relational attunement. How you CONNECT in creation.

structure.name: Structure
structure.short: The channel of manifestation. Stabilization, form, embodiment. How you MANIFEST in creation.

creation-phase.name: Creation Phase
creation-phase.short: Steps 0-9. Consciousness building its own architecture. Before the Turn. You're still laying foundations, not yet operating.

the-turn.name: The Turn
the-turn.short: Step 10 (Source). The pivot where creation becomes operation. Architecture complete — now consciousness operates through what it built.

operation-phase.name: Operation Phase
operation-phase.short: Steps 11-21. Consciousness operating through what it built. After the Turn. Using the architecture to create reality.

vertical-partner.name: Vertical Partner
vertical-partner.short: Sum to 20. Same node, different phases — one in Creation, one in Operation. The path home when Too Little.

diagonal-partner.name: Diagonal Partner
diagonal-partner.short: Sum to 19. Creative tension within the same House. The path home when Too Much.

reduction-partner.name: Reduction Partner
reduction-partner.short: Same digital root (digit sum). Cross-House shadow illumination. The path home when Unacknowledged.

pillar-1.name: Pillar 1: You Are Creating
pillar-1.short: The first truth. You are always creating — whether you know it or not. Associated with Potential (0).

pillar-2.name: Pillar 2: You Are the Creator
pillar-2.short: The second truth. Not just creating, but a creator — an agent with direction. Associated with Will (1).

pillar-3.name: Pillar 3: Seven Pillars of Purpose
pillar-3.short: The portal truth. Purpose flows from Source through these seven interdependent truths. Associated with Source (10).

pillar-4.name: Pillar 4: Authentic Creation
pillar-4.short: Spirit House pillar. Creation must be authentically yours — not borrowed patterns. Associated with Wisdom, Nurturing, Inspiration, Imagination.

pillar-5.name: Pillar 5: Genuine Participation
pillar-5.short: Mind House pillar. You must genuinely participate — not just observe. Associated with Order, Culture, Abstraction, Breakthrough.

pillar-6.name: Pillar 6: Unified Purpose
pillar-6.short: Emotion House pillar. Purpose must be unified with feeling — not split. Associated with Compassion, Drive, Change, Balance, Creation.

pillar-7.name: Pillar 7: Present Moment Awareness
pillar-7.short: Body House pillar. Creation happens NOW — not in imagined futures or dead pasts. Associated with Fortitude, Discipline, Equity, Sacrifice, Actualization, Awareness.

instant-return.name: Instant Return
instant-return.short: The return to Now is always instant. Acknowledge connection to the Whole. Remember you're a creator within the Creator. Come home to presence.

retrieval.name: Retrieval
retrieval.short: The structural path home from Ring 7. Not punishment, not penance — just the route to bring unintegrated creation back into the Now.

inner-bound.name: Inner Bound
inner-bound.short: Numbers 1-5 (Ace through 5). The inward-facing, potential-holding, forming half of an Archetype's range. What the function IS at rest.

outer-bound.name: Outer Bound
outer-bound.short: Numbers 6-10. The outward-facing, expressed, gathered half of an Archetype's range. What the function DOES in action.

activation.name: Activation
activation.short: Potential through Intent at Genesis. The spark of becoming — will igniting existence. Pure beginning of directed force.

orientation.name: Orientation
orientation.short: Inspiration through Intent at Equilibrium. Visionary direction-setting, balanced between possible paths.

assertion.name: Assertion
assertion.short: Order through Intent at Emergence. Structure asserting outward, the first framework of directed will.

alignment.name: Alignment
alignment.short: Drive through Intent at Grounding. Momentum in harmonious alignment, stable propulsion.

dedication.name: Dedication
dedication.short: Sacrifice through Intent at Application. Purposeful release in action, testing what must be given up.

recognition.name: Recognition
recognition.short: Sacrifice through Intent at Participation. Release acknowledged by others, what you gave up witnessed.

resolve.name: Resolve
resolve.short: Drive through Intent at Harvest. Momentum defending position, reaping what determination sowed.

command.name: Command
command.short: Order through Intent at Immersion. Structure in swift execution, deep engagement with directed will.

wellspring.name: Wellspring
wellspring.short: Inspiration through Intent at Overflow. Vision persisting through abundance, myriad expressions of radiant will.

attainment.name: Attainment
attainment.short: Potential through Intent at Closure. Becoming fully carried, the weight of completion.

perception.name: Perception
perception.short: Actualization through Cognition at Genesis. Clarity initiating, the first cut of discernment.

reflection.name: Reflection
reflection.short: Wisdom through Cognition at Equilibrium. Discernment weighing options, balanced perception.

calculation.name: Calculation
calculation.short: Abstraction through Cognition at Emergence. Pattern recognition emerging, the first pierce of insight.

repose.name: Repose
repose.short: Balance through Cognition at Grounding. Integration finding peace, stable equilibrium of mind.

conflict.name: Conflict
conflict.short: Discipline through Cognition at Application. Refinement through internal testing, the clash of practice.

guidance.name: Guidance
guidance.short: Discipline through Cognition at Participation. Refinement moving outward, practice becoming navigation.

reconciliation.name: Reconciliation
reconciliation.short: Balance through Cognition at Harvest. Integration gathering its insights, reaping equilibrium.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.short: Abstraction through Cognition at Immersion. Deep engagement with pattern, seeing constraints fully.

plurality.name: Plurality
plurality.short: Wisdom through Cognition at Overflow. Perception holding myriad possibilities, abundance of knowing.

realization.name: Realization
realization.short: Actualization through Cognition at Closure. Clarity completing, understanding anchored in soul.

receptivity.name: Receptivity
receptivity.short: Awareness through Resonance at Genesis. The first willingness to feel, recognition opening.

merge.name: Merge
merge.short: Compassion through Resonance at Equilibrium. Loving connection finding balance, two becoming available.

celebration.name: Celebration
celebration.short: Culture through Resonance at Emergence. Transmission through feeling, shared meaning rippling outward.

drift.name: Drift
drift.short: Balance through Resonance at Grounding. Integration finding emotional stability, contemplating what's offered.

reckoning.name: Reckoning
reckoning.short: Equity through Resonance at Application. Internal accounting — the private felt-sense of accounts being weighed before external balance.

reciprocity.name: Reciprocity
reciprocity.short: Equity through Resonance at Participation. Fairness flowing outward, balance in giving and receiving.

allure.name: Allure
allure.short: Balance through Resonance at Harvest. Integration gathering possibilities, reaping emotional options.

passage.name: Passage
passage.short: Culture through Resonance at Immersion. Transmission through deep leaving, walking away from what was shared.

fulfillment.name: Fulfillment
fulfillment.short: Compassion through Resonance at Overflow. Loving connection in abundance, wishes granted through care.

completion.name: Completion
completion.short: Awareness through Resonance at Closure. Recognition completing in relationship, emotional wholeness.

initiation.name: Initiation
initiation.short: Will through Structure at Genesis. Direction taking form, the first contour of manifestation.

poise.name: Poise
poise.short: Nurturing through Structure at Equilibrium. Cultivation in dynamic balance, juggling what needs tending.

formation.name: Formation
formation.short: Breakthrough through Structure at Emergence. Liberation taking initial form, building what was freed.

preservation.name: Preservation
preservation.short: Change through Structure at Grounding. Transformation finding stable form, holding what's becoming.

steadfastness.name: Steadfastness
steadfastness.short: Fortitude through Structure at Application. Strength tested through lack, holding on through scarcity.

support.name: Support
support.short: Fortitude through Structure at Participation. Strength moving outward, holding space for others.

cultivation.name: Cultivation
cultivation.short: Change through Structure at Harvest. Transformation gathering results, assessing what's grown.

commitment.name: Commitment
commitment.short: Breakthrough through Structure at Immersion. Liberation through deep practice, mastery from repetition.

flourishing.name: Flourishing
flourishing.short: Nurturing through Structure at Overflow. Cultivation in full abundance, the garden flourishing.

achievement.name: Achievement
achievement.short: Will through Structure at Closure. Direction fully manifest, legacy achieved.

initiate.name: Initiate
initiate.short: Learning the function — aspiring, witnessing, beginning to embody. The student stepping into capacity. Serves 'Witness Creation.'

catalyst.name: Catalyst
catalyst.short: Activating the function — channeling force, creating change through pattern. Moving fast, applying with directed energy. Serves 'Channel the Force.'

steward.name: Steward
steward.short: Nurturing the function — holding space, exercising free will in service. Not commanding but tending. Serves 'Free Will.'

executor.name: Executor
executor.short: Mastering the function — upholding the law, executing with full embodiment. Being this capacity completely. Serves 'Uphold the Law.'

initiate-of-intent.name: Initiate of Intent
initiate-of-intent.short: Inspiration embodied as learner of directed will. Discovering how to shine, aspiring to radiance.

catalyst-of-intent.name: Catalyst of Intent
catalyst-of-intent.short: Order embodied as activator of directed will. Charging forward to establish structure through action.

steward-of-intent.name: Steward of Intent
steward-of-intent.short: Drive embodied as nurturer of directed will. Holding space for momentum, sustaining propulsion through care.

executor-of-intent.name: Executor of Intent
executor-of-intent.short: Sacrifice embodied as master of directed will. Commanding through knowing when to release.

initiate-of-cognition.name: Initiate of Cognition
initiate-of-cognition.short: Wisdom embodied as learner of discernment. Discovering how to perceive, aspiring to direct knowing.

catalyst-of-cognition.name: Catalyst of Cognition
catalyst-of-cognition.short: Abstraction embodied as activator of discernment. Charging forward to reveal patterns.

steward-of-cognition.name: Steward of Cognition
steward-of-cognition.short: Balance embodied as nurturer of discernment. Holding space for integration, sustaining equilibrium through clarity.

executor-of-cognition.name: Executor of Cognition
executor-of-cognition.short: Discipline embodied as master of discernment. Commanding through refined practice.

initiate-of-resonance.name: Initiate of Resonance
initiate-of-resonance.short: Imagination embodied as learner of connection. Discovering how to dream, aspiring to vision.

catalyst-of-resonance.name: Catalyst of Resonance
catalyst-of-resonance.short: Culture embodied as activator of connection. Charging forward to transmit meaning through feeling.

steward-of-resonance.name: Steward of Resonance
steward-of-resonance.short: Compassion embodied as nurturer of connection. Holding space for bonding, sustaining love through care.

executor-of-resonance.name: Executor of Resonance
executor-of-resonance.short: Equity embodied as master of connection. Commanding through fair exchange, emotional balance with full presence.

initiate-of-structure.name: Initiate of Structure
initiate-of-structure.short: Nurturing embodied as learner of manifestation. Discovering how to cultivate, aspiring to growth.

catalyst-of-structure.name: Catalyst of Structure
catalyst-of-structure.short: Breakthrough embodied as activator of manifestation. Charging forward to liberate through building.

steward-of-structure.name: Steward of Structure
steward-of-structure.short: Change embodied as nurturer of manifestation. Holding space for transformation in form.

executor-of-structure.name: Executor of Structure
executor-of-structure.short: Fortitude embodied as master of manifestation. Commanding material reality through strength.

polarity.name: Polarity
polarity.short: P — Differentiation. Creates distinction, tension, boundary. The yang operation in the P/R alternation.

recursion.name: Recursion
recursion.short: R — Integration. Creates unity, stability, coherence. The yin operation in the P/R alternation. Self-reference.

veil.name: The Veil
veil.short: The limit on awareness that preserves authenticity. Not punishment but protection. Only through unknowing can genuine choice occur.

veil-of-individuation.name: Veil of Individuation
veil-of-individuation.short: The membrane that allows unique perspective. Without it, no genuine creation — just the Whole reflecting itself. The Veil is a gift.

nirmanakaya.name: Nirmanakaya
nirmanakaya.short: A framework mapping how consciousness works. From Buddhist philosophy meaning 'emanation body' — the form through which awakened consciousness appears. Here, the complete architecture of how awareness individualizes, creates, and returns to wholeness.

the-78-signatures.name: The 78 Signatures
the-78-signatures.short: The complete 'alphabet' of consciousness. Just as language uses letters, consciousness uses these 78 patterns to form all possible experiences: 22 Archetypes (major patterns), 40 Bounds (ranges of expression), and 16 Agents (behavioral personas).

the-law.name: The Law
the-law.short: The Law of Conscious Self-Creation. The fundamental principle: consciousness creates all structure through exactly two operations (Polarity and Recursion), alternating forever. P-R-P-R-P-R... Everything emerges from this rhythm.

law-of-conscious-self-creation.name: Law of Conscious Self-Creation
law-of-conscious-self-creation.short: Consciousness creates all structure through two operations alternating: Polarity (differentiation, distinction) and Recursion (integration, unity). Every thought, feeling, structure emerges from this P/R rhythm.

phi.name: Phi
phi.short: The golden ratio (≈1.618). Not just a pretty number — the mathematical signature of the Law itself. φ² = φ + 1 says: Self-application (Recursion) equals distinction (Polarity) plus unity (Source). Wherever phi appears in nature, you see the Law operating.

fibonacci.name: Fibonacci
fibonacci.short: The sequence 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21... converging toward Phi through alternating overshoot and undershoot — the same P/R alternation that generates the architecture. Note: 21 (Creation/World) appears directly.

forty-fold-seal.name: Forty-Fold Seal
forty-fold-seal.short: A 4×4 arrangement where every row, column, and 2×2 block sums to 40. The mathematical 'receipt' proving the derivation is valid. When you follow the Law through 22 steps, this pattern emerges necessarily.

the-three-seals.name: The Three Seals
the-three-seals.short: Three nested validations: Forty-Fold Seal (groupings sum to 40), Twenty-Two-Fold Seal (reduction pairs encoded), and Ten-Fold Seal (diagonal completeness). The system is self-validating.

forge.name: Forge
forge.short: Sun-aligned archetypes whose diagonal pairs sum to 19. Creates, differentiates, exhales. The yang movement that pushes outward, makes distinctions, generates new reality.

mirror.name: Mirror
mirror.short: World-aligned archetypes whose diagonal pairs sum to 21. Receives, integrates, inhales. The yin movement that draws inward, unifies, recognizes what already exists.

forge-mode.name: Forge Mode
forge-mode.short: Reading mode for assertions. The creative stance — you're declaring and testing intention. Used when you want to set direction rather than receive observation.

inquiry-mode.name: Inquiry Mode
inquiry-mode.short: Reading mode for questions. The receptive stance — you're asking and receiving. Used when seeking to understand your current location rather than assert direction.

reflect-mode.name: Reflect Mode
reflect-mode.short: Read-only observation mode. 'What is already happening?' Observes without changing. The most receptive stance available in a reading.

discover-mode.name: Discover Mode
discover-mode.short: Reveals authorship locations. 'Where is authorship available?' Shows where you have agency to create, not just observe.

realitycraft.name: Realitycraft
realitycraft.short: The practice of conscious creation. Using the Nirmanakaya framework to map awareness, identify where purpose flows or is blocked, and navigate the geometric path to alignment.

the-one-thing-happening.name: The One Thing Happening
the-one-thing-happening.short: Every reading reveals a single dynamic: how purpose is trying to realize itself and the friction it's meeting. Look for unity beneath apparent multiplicity.

meet-then-elevate.name: Meet Then Elevate
meet-then-elevate.short: The interpretive movement: (1) Meet — ground in the actual concern, start where they are. (2) Elevate — show the transcendental dimension. (3) Return — practical application at the grounded level.

nowism.name: Nowism
nowism.short: The teaching that Now is the only moment with write-access to creation. Past and future exist in memory and imagination — only Now is where you can actually create, choose, and change.

nowism-pyramid.name: Nowism Pyramid
nowism-pyramid.short: Visualizes aligned vs displaced states: One point at top (Balanced/Now-aligned), three points at base (Too Much, Too Little, Unacknowledged). One way to be aligned, three ways to be displaced.

collapse-point.name: Collapse Point
collapse-point.short: The present moment where possibilities become actualities. Every Now is a collapse point — quantum potential resolving into manifest reality through your choices.

return-to-now.name: Return to Now
return-to-now.short: The practice of recognizing you're already at the collapse point. Not a technique applied from outside but recognition that you never actually left. The architecture provides paths back.

seven-pillars.name: Seven Pillars
seven-pillars.short: Seven interdependent truths of purpose: (1) You Are Creating, (2) You Are the Creator, (3) Purpose via Source, (4) Authentic Creation, (5) Genuine Participation, (6) Unified Purpose, (7) Present Moment Awareness.

tesseract.name: Tesseract
tesseract.short: The four-dimensional hypercube structure underlying the architecture. Reduction pairs sit at maximum distance across this tesseract — farthest point that shares your essential number quality.

digital-root.name: Digital Root
digital-root.short: The single digit obtained by repeatedly summing digits (e.g., 19 → 1+9=10 → 1+0=1). Archetypes sharing a digital root are Reduction partners, connected across maximum structural distance.

yang.name: Yang
yang.short: The differentiating, outward movement. Polarity operation. The exhale of consciousness extending, creating distinction and boundary. Associated with Forge alignment.

yin.name: Yin
yin.short: The integrating, inward movement. Recursion operation. The inhale of consciousness drawing together, creating unity and coherence. Associated with Mirror alignment.

correction.name: Correction
correction.short: The path back to balance — if you want it. Correction doesn't repair; it enables. The architecture offers geometry, not opinions. Restoring balance immediately releases Ring 7 residue.

archetype.name: Archetype
archetype.short: The 22 major patterns of consciousness (positions 0-21). Not symbols to interpret but positions to derive — meanings come from where they sit in the structure, not from cultural associations.

bound.name: Bound
bound.short: The 40 parametric cards showing range of archetypal expression. Inner Bounds (Ace-5) represent capacity at rest. Outer Bounds (6-10) represent capacity expressed. Each archetype expresses through specific Bounds.

agent.name: Agent
agent.short: The 16 behavioral personas (Court cards) embodying archetypes as lived identities. Each Agent IS how its archetype shows up in observable action. Not a mask but lived expression.

transient.name: Transient
transient.short: The archetype/bound/agent identity of a drawn card — what it IS. Combined with Status (how it's expressing), forms the complete Signature of a card in a reading.

signature.name: Signature
signature.short: A card's complete identity: Transient (what it is) + Status (how it's expressing). The full meaning requires both — 'Too Little Equity' is a complete Signature.
